name: Miss Bit's Escape
description:
This is a submission for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.

Help Miss Bit escape from the all-consuming abyss.

Avoid chasing holes and escape to safety!

Personal Note:
(This game was made in one week, but I was really busy with university work so this game is extremely bare-bones.

The art was rushed in order to push through the game jam (By looking at it, obviously, I am NO artist).

A significant amount of time was spent just coding the hole spawning and moving.

I need to sleep and work on my university report, so I am pushing this game through and moving on.

Seriously, how do game devs make games in one week, let alone 24 hours. This is sooo difficult)
